prodNameC: 生物梅里埃木糖離胺酸去氧膽酸培養基
ingredientsDesc:
43563 XLD and 43564 XLD: Theoretical formula in g/l of purified water.
51049 XLD-D: Theoretical formula in g/l of purified water after reconstitution of the medium.

Sucrose                              7.5

Yeast extract                          3

Ferric ammonium citrate                0.8
Phenol red                           0.08
Agar                                13.5
applicantName: 香港商生物梅里埃有限公司台灣分公司

efficacy: 分離腸道致病菌，尤其是沙門氏菌和志賀氏菌。
